mapper.select: select auction_number,member_id,auction_category,auction_state,auction_title,hits,to_char(write_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "write_date",board_content,list_photo,min_price,start_price,end_price,to_char(end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "end_date" from auction_table where auction_number = #{auction_no}
select * from auction_table order by write_date desc
